headings: Campus Tour and ASU Ranch Tour/Meeting
Campus Tour and Commercial Aviation Hangar Tour/Meeting
Elementary and Middle School Field Trip
paragraphs: See what it means to be an Angelo State Ram!
When you step on campus, we consider you part of the Ram Family. Once you visit, we hope you will know Angelo State is the right fit for you!

Campus tours are offered Monday – Friday except for event days and holidays. We also offer occasional evening tours. This tour is like no other. We will share laughs, make memories and become best friends by the end.
Schedule a Campus Tour
Tour our beautiful campus, and then meet with faculty in our Norris-Vincent College of Business to learn more about majors and academic opportunities within the business field.
Sign up for a NVCOB tour
Take a guided tour of campus, and then meet with nursing faculty while touring our state-of-the-art simulation and skills labs to see where our students gain hands-on experience.
Sign up for a Nursing tour

Explore campus with a guided tour, and learn more about majors like biology, chemistry, biochemistry, computer science, engineering, geosciences, math and physics when you meet with our College of Science and Engineering faculty.
sign up for a stem tour
Take a guided campus tour, then visit the Management, Instruction and Research Center, our 6,000-acre ASU Ranch, to meet our agriculture faculty and explore majors and academic opportunities.
Sign up for an Ag tour
After you take a guided tour of campus, you’ll meet with the commercial aviation faculty at the hangar our students use and learn more about the fastest-growing aviation programs in Texas.
Sign up for a commercial aviation tour

Regístrate para un recorrido por el campus para ver lo que Angelo State tiene que ofrecer. Estamos emocionados de mostrarte nuestra hermosa universidad y conocerte a lo largo del recorrido por el campus. Organizaremos un recorrido por el campus en español una vez al mes.
Programe un recorrido en español
Discover Angelo State’s campus with our high school group tours. Our group tours are hosted Tuesday through Thursday. If you need assistance, reach out to us atadmissions@angelo.edu.
REQUEST A GROUP TOUR
Get in touch with us atoutreach@angelo.eduto learn more about our fantastic field trip opportunities for elementary and middle school students.
Request a field trip

Please note, campus tours will not be held on admissions event days or when the college is closed. Campus tours may be canceled when classes at Angelo State University are canceled due to inclement weather or other special conditions. However, we will give tours as long as it is safe to get across campus. We do give tours in the rain as long as we do not have lightning too close in proximity.
Admissions Events
Meet with an Admissions Counselor
Explore Academic Programs
Paying for College
Admitted? View your Next Steps
Take a virtual tour
Explore our beautiful campus from the comfort of your own home.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
ApplyVisit UsRequest Info

Schedule your tour in advance. Tour groups are limited in size, so you must have a reservation.
Please arrive 15 minutes before check in. The tours leave at a specific time and there may not be additional tour guides available if you are late.
Be sure to wear comfortable shoes, as this is a walking tour.
If you or your guests have any mobility or accessibility needs, please contact us ahead of time atadmissions@angelo.eduor 325-942-2041.
